document_data.caption: A trio of [[Udadrow]].
document_data.name: Udadrow
document_data.mainbody: '''Udadrow''', or as they were almost-exclusively known, '''drow''', were the most common variety of [[drow]] by far. Apart from extremely rare offshoots of drow (like the [[Lorendrow]] and [[Aevendrow]] who dwelt in secretive locations), all drow were Udadrow.{{Cite web/Legend of Drizzt}}
document_data.Description: These dark elves were those, or the descendants of those, who originally became influenced by the [[evil]] deity, [[Lolth]].
document_data.Society: Udadrow society was oppressive and xenophobic.
document_data.History: Due to the authoritative influence of the Spider Queen, almost all drow followed her ways to the [[Underdark]]. Two offshoot groups, Lorendrow and Aevendrow, did not. As they descended to the depths of the Underdark, Udadrow society become more and more corrupted by Lolth.
